backend/main.mo: Defines the backend canister with mixins, user profiles, places, routes, emergency profiles, SOS snapshots, and related CRUD and permission‑checked operations.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries linking features to affected files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of multiple frontend source files for reference or build planning.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining light/dark theme variables and global styling rules.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entrypoint mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React router setup defining all application routes and layout with theme and identity initialization.
frontend/src/components/auth/AccessDenie: UI screen shown when a user attempts to access a restricted admin page.
frontend/src/components/auth/AdminRouteG: Route guard that checks user role and blocks non-admin users with an access denied screen.
frontend/src/components/auth/Authenticat: Route guard prompting unauthenticated users to log in before accessing protected pages.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button managing Internet Identity auth flow and query cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Main layout wrapping header, navigation, mobile menu, content, and footer, with conditional navigation based on identity.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppNav.ts: Sidebar and mobile navigation menu with role-based admin link and route highlighting.
frontend/src/components/layout/BrandHead: Top header with branding, share button, emergency lookup button, and login controls.
frontend/src/components/profile/Emergenc: Generates, displays, copies, and rotates a user's emergency access code and shows their Principal ID.
Form for saving next-of-kin and medical information tied to the stored emergency access code.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileS: Dialog prompting new authenticated users to enter their name and create a profile.
frontend/src/components/profile/Verifica: Handles uploading license and ID documents with validation, progress tracking, and displays verification status.
frontend/src/components/share/FlyerPrevi: Renders a flyer preview with header, intro, QR code canvas, and share URL, showing loading and error states.
frontend/src/components/share/ShareDialo: Dialog for generating, sharing, copying, and downloading a QR code and link, using quick share and navigation helpers.
frontend/src/components/sos/PublicSOSCar: Displays emergency contacts and last known SOS location for first responders, including map links and timestamps.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refetching dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity authentication state, login flow, and identity persistence via an AuthClient provider.
frontend/src/hooks/useQrCodeCanvas.ts: Hook that renders a QR code to a canvas and tracks readiness or errors.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for user profiles, verification, places, and other backend interactions using the actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets Tailwind layers and defines light and dark theme CSS variables with global base styles.
frontend/src/lib/accessCode.ts: Generates, stores, retrieves, and clears a 12‑char access code in localStorage.
frontend/src/lib/clipboard.ts: Provides resilient clipboard copy functionality with a secure‑context API and fallback method.
frontend/src/lib/fileValidation.ts: Validates file size/type and includes a helper to format file sizes.
frontend/src/lib/flyerExport.ts: Exports a flyer DOM element as a high‑resolution PNG using an SVG foreignObject render approach.
frontend/src/lib/geolocation.ts: Wraps browser geolocation API to return coordinates with detailed error handling.
frontend/src/lib/placeCategory.ts: Maps place category enums to labels and provides options and lookup helper.
frontend/src/lib/qrCodeGenerator.ts: Implements a low‑level QR code generator with error correction and module layout logic.
frontend/src/lib/qrDownload.ts: Downloads a canvas as a PNG after validating dimensions and blob creation.
frontend/src/lib/quickShare.ts: Implements Web Share API helper with clipboard fallback and detailed result statuses.
frontend/src/lib/shareUrl.ts: Returns the canonical base share URL from window.location.origin.
frontend/src/lib/time.ts: Provides bigint‑based time conversion and date formatting utilities.
frontend/src/lib/urlParams.ts: Manages URL parameters for both query and hash routing with read/remove utilities.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/AddPlacePage.tsx: Form page for authenticated users to add a new place with name, category, location, and description using a mutation.
frontend/src/pages/AddRoutePage.tsx: Form page for creating a new route with start, destination, optional waypoints, date/time, and notes, then submitting via mutation.
frontend/src/pages/AdminReviewPage.tsx: Admin-only interface to look up a user by principal ID and approve or reject their verification status.
frontend/src/pages/EmergencyLookupPage.t: Public page allowing emergency responders to look up a user's emergency data using principal ID and access code.
frontend/src/pages/FlyerPage.tsx: Page that generates a shareable flyer with QR code, supports auto-export, manual download, and link copying.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Landing page showing hero section and feature cards; redirects authenticated users to the places list.
frontend/src/pages/PlaceDetailPage.tsx: Displays details for a selected place including description, category, and submitter info.
frontend/src/pages/PlacesListPage.tsx: Lists searchable and filterable safe places with an option to add new ones.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: User profile view showing account info plus verification and emergency profile management.
frontend/src/pages/RouteDetailPage.tsx: Placeholder page for viewing details of a specific route.
frontend/src/pages/RoutesListPage.tsx: Displays user routes and lets users search routes by principal, with an option to add new routes.
frontend/src/pages/SOSCardPage.tsx: Shows the user's emergency SOS card if available or prompts setup when missing.
frontend/src/pages/SOSPage.tsx: Defines the SOS page UI, allowing authenticated users to capture their current location via a snapshot mutation and navigate to the SOS card.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utilities for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and managing hash-based query cleanup.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind CSS with custom colors, animations, container settings, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, feature versions, known issues, and architectural notes for the build state.
